title: Phase 3: Test & Refine Mouse Movement Patterns
description:
Ensure jiggle is subtle but effective

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Jiggle movement is small enough to not interfere with user
- [ ] Jiggle is random enough to prevent detection patterns
- [ ] Works on multi-monitor setups
- [ ] Handle edge cases: screen edges, full-screen apps
- [ ] Test accessibility permissions flow

title: Phase 5: Polish - Icon, Notifications, Distribution
description:
Final polish for production

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] App icon design
- [ ] Notification when jiggler activates/deactivates
- [ ] Signed & notarized app bundle
- [ ] DMG installer or Homebrew formula
- [ ] Comprehensive README with screenshots
- [ ] GitHub Actions for CI/CD

title: Phase 4: Add Settings & Menu Bar Mode
description:
Add customization options and menu bar mode

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Settings panel with configurable idle threshold (1-60 min)
- [ ] Settings panel with configurable jiggle interval (1-60 sec)
- [ ] Menu bar only mode (no dock icon)
- [ ] Persistent settings storage (UserDefaults)
- [ ] Launch at login option
- [ ] Keyboard shortcut to toggle on/off

title: Phase 2: Fine-tune Idle Detection Accuracy
description:
Verify and improve idle time detection using IOKit

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Test idle detection works correctly across different macOS versions
- [ ] Verify 5-minute threshold triggers accurately
- [ ] Handle edge cases (sleep/wake, screen lock)
- [ ] Add unit tests for IdleMonitor
